sentence: What is your family’s cultural background? Do your mother and father come from the same caste or tribe or from different castes / tribes? Please describe in detail your caste and cultural background

What is your family’s religious background? Was religion observed in your home? If religion was observed in your home, how was it observed? Describe the daily / weekly / regular religious rituals that you follow
Describe your current relationship with your language(s). Do you feel a strong cultural connection to any of the languages that you speak?
Describe in detail the community (or communities) you grew up in. Was it urban or rural?
Other than your own cultural group, what other cultural groups lived in your community? Other groups can include people from different religions, ethnicities, castes, tribes, etc.
Does your family originate from the place you grew up, or from a different place? What do you know about that place? Have you ever visited it?
What do you remember about your grandparents? Tell us something about them
Did you grow up hearing about any of your early ancestors whom you never met? What did you hear about them? Tell us something about that
Have you lived through any major historical events? Describe how you and your family were affected by these events.
What were your family’s economic circumstances? Do you remember any times when your family faced economic difficulties? Please describe.

What skills and activities did you learn while you were growing up? Who taught you these skills? Skills and activities can include fishing, hunting, farming, cooking, carpentry, crafts, weaving, specific sports, and many other important things. Tell us something about what you learnt and how it is done.
Describe your sibling(s) and your interactions with them when you were young. Were you very close in age? Did you attend school together?
What did you do in your spare time during your adolescence? Disucss in detail
What are some of the foods you ate when you were growing up? Discuss in detail.
What occupation(s) did you want to pursue when you were a child? Why?
Describe your current occupation. Where do you work?
Describe how you chose your occupation. Do you wish to stay in this occupation? Why?
What are some of the difficulties related to your job/employment?
What festivals does your family celebrate in a normal year? Tell us about these in detail.
Can you describe some of your local friends? What kinds of activities do you do together?
If you are in a relationship, how did you meet your current partner (husband, wife, boyfriend, girlfriend, significant other)? What brought you together?
Are you married? If so, describe your wedding celebration? If not, describe the marriage ceremony of someone you know
What types of sports, games and pastimes have you been involved with in your life?
How do you maintain your level of health?
What are your favorite foods that are unique to your culture or region? Tell us about these in detail.
Describe your personality. What are some of your strengths?
What things in your life are the most important to you right now?
What qualities do you look for in your friendships and relationships?
Are there any cultural or humanitarian causes that are important to you? Please describe.
What are your immediate goals for the future?
What are your long-term goals for yourself and your family?
How have you changed since your childhood? How has your community changed since your childhood?
What aspects of your language do you find unique?
How do different generations of your community interact with their language?
What changes do you think might happen to your culture and language in the near future?
What is your advice for future generations?
In which places and during which events do you hear stories told in your language?
Tell me a folktale that you remember hearing as a child or adolescent?
Are there any particular authors or storytellers in your language who are important to you? Please describe.
Please describe the traditional music of your culture. What instruments are used?
What other musical styles did you grow up listening to?
When do you listen to music in your daily life, and how do you access it? Do you listen to musicians in person, or do you listen to recorded music?
What are some foods from your culture that you highly recommend?
Describe the traditional clothing of your culture.
What clothing and clothing styles did you grow up with?
Do you currently wear any traditional clothes? Please describe if you wear them everyday or for specific occasions. If on specific occasions, which occasions?
Describe any pieces of clothing that hold a particular significance to you.
How are the different genders of your community expected to conduct themselves?
Describe a typical day in your life (this year).
Describe your appearance and choice in clothing for daily activities.
What are your preferred methods of transport? Do you enjoy traveling ? How do you get to work?
Describe the architecture of your area, as well as the traditional architecture of your culture.
Describe the physical geography of your area.
Describe the kinds of animals that live in your area.
Describe the kinds of plants that live in your area.
What big technological advancements have you experienced? Which have been the most meaningful to you and why?
What are your preferred modes of communication? How have methods of communication changed during your life?
Is there any other information that you would like to share about your daily life?
